title: Mashed Potatoes And Celery Root
summary: Mashed Potatoes And Celery Root might be just the side dish you are searching for. One portion of this dish contains roughly 4g of protein, 7g of fat, and a total of 187 calories. This recipe serves 8. For 55 cents per serving, this recipe covers 7% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. If you have butter, half-and-half, pepper, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 46 minutes. Thanksgiving will be even more special with this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and vegetarian diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 27%. This score is not so excellent. Similar recipes include Mashed Celery-root Potatoes, Mashed Potatoes And Celery Root, and Garlic-infused Mashed Potatoes And Celery Root.
